About Me

Let me tell you few things

BIO

I recently graduated from University of California, Irvine with Bachelors in Computer Science and Mathematics. I am define my self as a Software Developer and a Teacher. I believe learning never stops despite of any institutional degrees. I am fond of algorithms that require data structures and involves a bit of Mathematics in it. I beleive developing a product is solving a problem. I am always ready to grab a pen and paper to draw a prototype to a solution.

Software Development

Full Stack Developer

Developed an Online Platform for Tutors dedicated to a Community College. Helps Connect Tutors and chat to maintain tutor community.

Teacher

Community College Instructional Aide

Have Taught Mathematics and Java at Cerritos College for 5 years. Classes such as Linear Algebra and Differential Equations

Entreprenuer

Private school

Have given a good time of time on the establishment of a private school which helps community kids and students acheive success in academic field. Investment on a school has been a dream ever since I started teaching.
